name: Fontcase Vault File
summary: Learn about .VAULT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VAULT files are not opened directly by the user. Instead Fontcase saves them automatically in the [user]/​Library/​Application Support/​Fontcase/​ directory.

description: Data file created by Fontcase, a font manager for Mac OS X; saves the list of imported user, shared, or system level fonts; also saves the activation or deactivation status of each font as well as other metadata such as ratings.
